data.persona: I fly high and bring beautiful music to the people. I soar high and low going where the wind takes me. My melodious tunes bring peace and tranquility to every garden I visit.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
Large clear outdoor meadow. Flowers of blue and white appearing in bunches here and there. The grass glows with a green light. Not much can be said about its appearance, however there is a mystical allure associated with the place as if a meadow for spirits instead of livestock.
There's a flower, a grass, a dead people, and an a thorn bush here.
The wasp is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must pay my respects to the spirit of the last king, a man who loved my songs and someone I greatly admired.
data.mid_motivation: I must appease the spirits of the last king's deceased followers as well, to bring closure to the realm in the aftermath of the last great battle.
data.long_motivation: I want this ethereal meadow to become a place of worship and remembrance for future generations of humans who live here.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go to the meadow and sing a song or two.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat breadcrumbs left for me by passersby, upon the headstones of the dead.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the wasp and chase it away to ensure it doesn't pester humans who are passing through to pay their respects to the fallen. On the way, I spot a rare and magical fire flower.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the fire flower upon the stone monument marking the grave of the last king.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go other grave sites, repeating the same gesture.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put the final fire flower in the gravesite of my former owner, the last king's groundskeeper, who was also killed in the last battle.
